title: Symbiose
typeOfFood: Vegan, International, Organic, Western, Take-out, German
description: Organic restaurant and bar that cooks vegan food. Lunch menu features salads, warm dishes, dips and bread. Evening meals are an international a la carte menu with organic wine and juice from the Saxony region. Sunday is brunch then evening menu. Has a children's play area. Since 2013 took over the location Restaurant Eden and in 2014 menu switched from vegetarian to vegan.
